title: Never got an e-mail stating why i got banned like it says when i try to log in
body: Could u guys possibly send another e-mail or something?

replies.body:
Thanks I got a response, was a charge back like a thought
EDIT: could someone close/delete thread?
still haven't gotten an e-mail or a response on the ticket
They will get to you by Tuesday. Please check back every few hours between now and then.
I looked into this and see that you've already submitted a ticket.  A specialist will reach out to you as soon as possible with further context.  Thanks for your patience!
